Class ExceptionMethods

    • nl.naturalis.common.ExceptionMethods
  • public class ExceptionMethods
extends Object
    Methods related to exception handling.
    Author:
    Ayco Holleman

      static String getDetailedMessage​(Throwable t)
      Returns a detailed exception message that includes the class, method and line of the absolute origin of the provided exception.
      static String getDetailedMessage​(Throwable t, String origin)
      Returns a detailed exception message that gives better insight into where in your own code things flew off the rails.
      static Throwable getRootCause​(Throwable t)
      Returns the root cause of the provided throwable, or the throwable itself if it has no cause.
      static String getRootStackTraceAsString​(Throwable t)
      Returns the stack trace of the root cause of t as a string.
      static RuntimeException uncheck​(Throwable t)
      Returns the provided throwable if it already is a RuntimeException, else an UncheckedException wrapping the throwable.
      static RuntimeException wrap​(Throwable t)
      Returns the provided throwable if it already is a RuntimeException, else a RuntimeException wrapping the throwable.

      • getDetailedMessage

        public static String getDetailedMessage​(Throwable t)
        Returns a detailed exception message that includes the class, method and line of the absolute origin of the provided exception. Equivalent to new ExceptionSource(getRootCause(t)).getDetailedMessage().
        Parameters:
        t - The exception to extract the extra information from
        Returns:
        See Also:
        ExceptionOrigin.getDetailedMessage()

      • getDetailedMessage

        public static String getDetailedMessage​(Throwable t,
                                        String origin)
        Returns a detailed exception message that gives better insight into where in your own code things flew off the rails. It embellishes the provided throwable's message with information extracted from the most recent stack trace element matching origin. For example: getDetailedMessage(e, "nl.naturalis"). This will indicate from which method in nl.naturalis code the exception originated.
        Parameters:
        t - The exception to extract the extra information from
        origin - The (partial) name of the package or class you want to zoom in on
        Returns:

      • wrap

        public static RuntimeException wrap​(Throwable t)
        Returns the provided throwable if it already is a RuntimeException, else a RuntimeException wrapping the throwable.
        Parameters:
        t - A checked or unchecked exception
        Returns:
        The provided throwable or a RuntimeException wrapping it

      • uncheck

        public static RuntimeException uncheck​(Throwable t)
        Returns the provided throwable if it already is a RuntimeException, else an UncheckedException wrapping the throwable.
        Parameters:
        t - A checked or unchecked exception
        Returns:
        The provided throwable or an UncheckedException wrapping it
